inn1.comm: starts off with a full one on the stumps and driven down to mid-on

Irfan has struck second ball! Ingram squared up by extra bounce, short of a length and Ingram was pinned to the back foot, held his bat out to fend it away, took the outside edge and the men behind the wicket knew instantly he was gone
this was full outside the off stump and he pushes this down to cover where the fielder stops it
fires that full on the stumps and driven down the track and Irfan stops it with his boot
this one hurried him at the crease, extra bounce and he awkwardly fended it off
this one comes back in off the pitch, not much bounce off a good length and left alone
you can't feed it to Smith's pads, full and swinging back in towards the stumps, easily flicked away behind square
good length on the stumps and tucked away wide of mid-on for a quick single
hits a good length outside off and it comes back in, he leaves it alone
gets away with a half volley outside off as he pushes it down to mid-off
nips back in outside off and he clips it to midwicket
stays behind the line and defends it to the off side
this was short down the leg side, he tried to glove it away
good length just outside the off stump, he doesn't offer a shot this time
skidded through to the pads and he's struck on the leg as he tries to work it away, that was missing leg
skids through again and he gets an inside edge to fine leg
he stays right behind the line and defends down the track
slightly short of a length outside off, no movement to the keeper
tucks him up for room and he stays back and knocks it to mid-on
this was full and wide outside off and he looked to drive but got an inside edge that bounced and lobbed over the stumps
nicely defended on the front foot, drifting towards the stumps and he was forward
good length outside off and he was nicely forward to drive but straight to mid-off
gives him width outside the off stump and he pushes it towards point and he can't find the gap
good length outside the off stump and punched to the off side again
that was nicely timed! Outside off and a bit too much width, went forward and punched it wide of cover and this outfield is quick, certainly quicker than that for the Tests
nips back in and he works it away towards mid-on
not the best running, he worked it towards square leg and set off and the non-striker had to hurry, Afridi's throw was wide at the striker's end
driven down the track and he manages to stop it
stays beside the line and steers it down to third man
he stays right behind the line and fends off a short one to the on side
struck him high on the pads and there was a shout, too optimistic
that was good improvisation from Smith, he shuffled across very early to the off stump and you could see the other two, too straight from Tanvir and easily flicked to fine leg
gives him width and he opens the face and dabs it to third man
gets forward and punches it neatly but straight to Afridi at cover
slower one outside off and Duminy didn't pick it early enough, mistimed it to the on side
stays back and punches it to the off side
gives him a hint of width and he opens the face and guides it to third man
this was short and looking to clear the batsman and Duminy fetched that above his head and hooked it to fine leg, controlled it well
clipped away to the on side and the throw from deep midwicket was to the bowler's end and Smith had to dive, Misbah broke the bails but the batsman was home, 3rd umpire takes a look
Duminy looks in fine touch! Width outside off and he stays beside it and easily cuts it wide of backward point
good length on middle and leg and he clips it away towards mid-on
fullish in length on middle and leg and he pushes it down to mid-on
keeps it full on the stumps and he drives straight to mid-off
beats him! Landed outside off and held its line, Smith was prodding forward with uncertainty
loopy slower ball, he steers it towards backward point and they hesitate and take the single
stays beside the line and he steers it down to point again
tucks him up for room and he stays back and knocks it to the off side
keeps it tight and he stays back and knocks it towards mid-off
that was a slower ball that turns into a low full toss, didn't really put that away and he ended up pushing it just wide of mid-off
stays beside the line and he opens the face and neatly guides it to third man
gives him a bit too much width and he cuts him wide of backward point, Wahab sprints from third man and cuts it off
a bit too straight and he easily clips it away behind square, Smith shuffles across very early
gets beside the line and steers it towards point
a bit too straight again and he easily tucks it to deep square leg
pulled straight to square leg! Tanvir dug it in short and Duminy swiveled and looked to pull over square leg, he couldn't have picked the fielder more accurately, Amin didn't have to move much
shuffles across the stumps and Faf defends down the track
edged and short of first slip! Slower ball and Faf opened the face of the bat and kept it down, the ball dipped and dropped in front of Jamshed
another outside edge, it's all happening, pitches on middle and Faf not covering the line, drops well short of slip
keeps it outside off and it moves away, doesn't get his bat anywhere near it this time
this was outside off and he stays beside the line and steers it to the off side
stays beside the line and chops it wide of backward point
stays back at the crease and knocks it to the on side
slower through the air and he clips it to the on side
moves across early to defend, hit on the pad outside the line, turn already for Ajmal
works it with the turn to the on side
tossed up and he comes well forward and defends
another slower ball but it was a half volley outside off, Faf was a long way across the stumps and he flicked it away with ease wide of midwicket, top shot
moves across his stumps again and knocks it to the off side
this was full on the stumps and he pushes it down to mid-off
slower ball and another loopy full toss which he places just wide of cover, the fielder fumbles
shuffles across the stumps and he clips it towards midwicket
a bit too straight and he works it away wide of square leg
comes down the track and checks his shot, knocks it to short fine leg

There's an appeal for a caught behind and he's been given not out and Misbah wants it reviewed , tossed up outside off and Smith was forward, the ball turned and soon after it passed the bat Akmal was supremely confident and immediately asked his captain to review it, it was mighty close but not enough evidence to overturn the decision
comes forward and knocks it to mid-on

so much for the fuss over the caught behind appeal a few balls back! Smith was lunging forward to drive, Ajmal tossed it up slower from round the wicket, Smith was beaten and he failed to drag his back foot back, Akmal whipped off the bails immediately
gets forward and drives to the off side
short of a length outside off and he safely leaves it alone
angles across the right-hander and he leaves it alone
fullish in length outside off and he pushes it towards mid-off
sharp angle across the right-hander and it was too wide, he is penalised
nicely timed, this was on a good length on the stumps and he showed the full face of the bat and pushed it down the ground
good length on the stumps and he shuffles slight and works it to the on side
gets forward and he gets an inside edge to the pads
tossed up and he comes forward and knocks it to the on side
was forward and the ball spun, may have got an edge to the pads, optimistic shout

he has been given out lbw and Faf wants it reviewed, landed a touch wide outside off and spun back in appreciably, Faf shuffled a long way across the stumps and looked to clip it away to the on side, hit on the pads, you could see the leg stump, Hawk Eye shows that hitting the leg stump and he has to go
stays back and he punches it to the off side
he stays behind the line and punches it to mid-off
fullish in length outside off and he pushes it down to mid-off
goes back and across at the crease and punches it to the on side
loose drive from AB! Not moving his feet and he had some width, didn't use his feet and played from the crease, risking an edge
good length on the stumps and he knocks it to the on side for a single
tossed up and he gets forward and drives to long-on
flatter one and he stays back and defends
shuffles across and drives him down the track
shuffles across and defends to the off side
tossed up and he comes across and works it to square leg
flatter and quicker and on the pads and easily whipped to deep midwicket
shuffles across and he works it away down to deep square leg
this was short and a touch wide outside off and he dabs it to the off side
close call for Miller as he gets an inside edge to the boot, the ball rolls away but away from the stumps
edged and dropped short! Miller had the width but he very half heartedly looked to dab it wide of the keeper and slip, it dipped low to Akmal's left and it bounced as well
streaky! This was full and wide outside the off stump and Miller reached out and threw his bat at it and the outside edge was well clear of first slip
this one beats him and nearly takes the outside edge

Ajmal juggles and takes it on the second attempt! Tossed up on the stumps, the doosra, AB went down the track but checked his shot, ended up chipping it tamely back to the bowler, Ajmal held out his right hand over his head, fumbled and ensured he took it on the second attempt
gets on the front foot and defends
in the air and down to the on side
tossed up and he comes well forward and defends
good length outside off and he pushes it to the off side
good length on the stumps and he gets forward and defends
he should have put this one away, this was short and wide outside off and he looked to slash it wide of point and he missed it, close to the edge
goes back at the crease and punches it to the off side
slower ball and it's a full toss which he pushes back to the bowler
whips a fuller ball down to mid-on and the non-striker stays back at the crease
punched off the back foot and nicely stopped at cover, runs hard to come by
tossed up and McLaren comes forward and defends
quicker through the air and he comes forward and defends
goes back at the crease and whips it away down to mid-on
he gets well forward and defends
comes forward and drives a full delivery to cover
comes forward and he gets an outside edge wide of slip
drifts on the pads and he works it away wide of midwicket
good length outside the off stump and he punches it wide of cover
fullish outside the off stump and he drives him wide of cover, the sweeper picks up
lovely shot! Wahab bowls it short of a length and gives Miller enough width to stand back and punch him wide of the covers, stand and deliver, balance was perfect
bowls it full on the pads and he works it to the leg side
slip for Hafeez, tossed up and he comes forward and drives to long-off
stays back at the crease and he punches it down to cover
tossed up and he comes forward to defend
quicker one and he manages to get behind the line to defend
quicker one and he works it away wide of square leg
quicker one and he gets forward and defends
good length on the stumps and he works it away down to mid-on
good length outside off and Miller comes forward and drives to cover
fuller one on the stumps and he drives him to the off side
doesn't give him much width and he ends up chopping it to point
chipped in the air and it's safe and down to long-on
bowls a fuller one this time which he digs out back to the bowler
comes down the track and he checks his drive to the on side
comes forward and drives down the pitch
McLaren makes a bit of room but gets down to defend
premeditated sweep, fetched it from the off stump and placed down to fine leg
flatter one and he gets forward and defends
quicker one and he comes forward and defends
good length outside off and he gets forward and he gets forward and defends
sign of aggression from McLaren, he fetches a short one from outside off and looks to pull in front of square but cannot beat mid-on
stays beside the line and punches it down to backward point
he gets forward and pushes it just wide of cover
a bit too straight and he shuffles and clips it behind square
good running, he punches it in front of cover and sets off quickly, his partner cooperates
loosener outside off, short and wide and he cuts straight to point
quicker and fuller and he plonks forward and defends
the 'X' celebration is out! Afridi bowls that quicker and fuller outside off, McLaren gets forward and spoons a low catch, Afridi takes it easily, SA lose their sixth and still 14 short of 100
thrusts his pad forward and leaves it to the keeper
the googly beats his drive and Akmal whips off the bails but Parnell was in
fullish outside off and he gets forward and defends
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
shot of authority! Tossed up on the stumps and Miller gets on his knee and slogs him over square leg
comes forward and works it towards midwicket
clips it against the turn to midwicket
goes deep in the crease and punches it to cover
stays back and punches it towards deep cover
Parnell pounded that down the ground! Fuller ball, he bashed that along the ground across the line and down to the straight boundary
he chips it in the air down to mid-off
gets well forward and pushes it to the off side
outside edge but safe, tossed up wide outside the off stump, he reaches out and gets an outside edge that beats slip
beaten on the drive and Akmal breaks the bails
goes for the drive but gets an inside edge back to the bowler
gets forward and works it away to midwicket
he makes room and punches it back to the bowler
stays deep in the crease and punches him to long-off
gives it more air and he drives him to long-off
gets forward and pushes him down to long-off for another easy single
stays back and he works it away to midwicket
comes well forward and defends
spanked away! Afridi dropped this one short and wide outside off, Parnell stayed back and bashed that wide of covers, the fielders didn't move
comes forward and shoulders arms
gets forward and drives to cover
goes back at the crease and punches it to cover
gets forward and works it against the angle wide of midwicket
comes forward and defends with soft hands
flatter one and he gets across and clips it wide of square leg
gives himself room and punches it wide of cover
good running, he chips it in the air towards mid-on and sets off quickly, puts pressure on the fielder and they complete the second
drives this one towards long-on
chipped it in the air but wide of the bowler
gets forward and drives to long-off
gets well forward and defends
gets down to sweep but he's hit outside the line of the stumps
stays beside the line and he punches it to the off side
gives him width and he looks to cut but he ends up chopping it towards the keeper
he just drifts a bit to the pads and he whips it away down to fine leg
beats him with a peach! Landed outside off and moved away, Miller was drawn forward and nearly edged it
that was neatly punched through the off side, had some width and the sweeper cut that off
fullish on the stumps and he drives him down to sweeper cover
Afridi takes another low catch, another soft dismissal, gives it more air, Miller was forward looking to chip it away but ended up spooning it low to Afridi who fell forward and took the catch
he gets an outside edge and Hafeez does well to slide and cut it off
gets well forward and drives  back to the bowler

sloppy stuff by Riaz! On the pads and Morkel lofted that down to wide long-on, Riaz ran to his left and had it covered, too lazy to get his body down and he tried to stop it with his boot, made a mess of it
that was straightforward! Afridi pushed that quicker, Morkel took the risk of getting down to sweep, struck on the thigh plumb in front of the stumps and that's Afridi's third
that was quick! 130 kph and Tsotsobe was beaten outside off
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
quicker through the air and he comes forward and defends
goes back at the crease and punches it past the bowler who fumbled
he comes forward and defends to the off side
gets forward and works it to the on side
comes forward and gets an inside edge to square leg
he goes back and punches it back to the bowler
tossed up and he drives just wide of the bowler to long-on
the straighter one and he stabbed it back to the bowler
gets nicely forward and across and defends
slower through the air and he comes forward and defends
gets forward and drives back to the bowler
was that the switch hit? It was! Tossed up on middle, Parnell changed position quickly and sent it high over backward point, no fielder in  sight
comes down the track and gets an inside edge to the pads
gets forward and drives him down to long-on
slower through the air and he comes forward and defends
pushes it down the ground to long-on
quicker through the air and he defends this one to cover
quicker and shorter and he punches it straight to cover
goes back at the crease and punches this one down to wide long-off
drifts on the pads and he works it to the leg side
quicker one and he gets well forward and defends
teased him with a slower one and struck him high on the pads, stifled appeal
starts off with a fuller one and he gets forward and pushes it to the off side
fires a full one down the leg side, it was close to the pads but the umpire didn't think it was wide enough to be called
swings and gets an inside edge that drops short of the keeper, Tsotsobe was slow off the blocks and the throw to the batsman's end was wide
gets a sharp angle across the right-hander and Tsotsobe poked his bat out
this was wider across the stumps and safely left alone
ends the over with a fuller one fired outside off, he reaches out to drive but misses
fine shot by Parnell, Afridi tossed that up and Parnell was down the track and lofted it down the ground wide of long-off
comes forward and defends
makes a hint of room and lofts the other side, the ball drops well short of long-on
quicker one and he gets forward to defend
down the track and nearly yorks himself, digs it out to mid-on where the fielder does well to stop it
quicker one and he gets an inside edge to the pads
steers it wide of point and Parnell is fine giving Tsotsobe the strike
aims for the base of the stumps but it's a low full toss that's dug out to midwicket
too good for Tsotsobe, angles across him, steep bounce and he nearly edges it to the keeper
looks to pull but he mistimes it to mid-on, he needs to bowl yorkers
fullish outside off and he swings and misses
comes round the wicket this time and tucks him up at the crease, the ball clips the top of the pad and lobs towards the slips
drops it a bit short and he pulls him down to deep midwicket
he goes for the slog and just clears square leg, the sweeper cuts it off
banged that one! It was a half-tracker from Afridi, Parnell rocked back and pulled him several rows over deep midwicket
gets forward and pushes him wide of extra cover
watches it turn back in, the googly, no shot offered
lands it outside off and Parnell doesn't offer a shot
keeps it on the stumps and Parnell stays back and defends
Parnell's willing to bide his time, he stays behind and defends to the off side
good length on the stumps and he stays back and defends
punched that towards mid-off and quickly set off, put pressure on Ajmal who fumbled and that gives Tsotsobe the strike
don't ask me how that missed the leg stump! From round the wicket, angled back in and the batsman played all around it, missed the stumps by a whisker
wide outside off and he drives to cover and there's a misfield
Riaz's having a horror of a day in the field! Tsotsobe went down  the pitch and smacked a full ball wide of mid-off and Riaz got down too early and made a mess of it
this is some resistance! Tossed up and he went down the track and lofted it several rows over wide long-on, top shot from the No.10
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
slower through the air and he gets an inside edge
digs out a full delivery to the off side
good slower ball and Parnell was beaten as he tried to dab it away
stays back at the crease and punches it away down to long-on
slower ball from round the wicket, he chips it in the air but just short of Irfan at mid-off
full one outside off and he jams it out towards mid-off who is deep, they are happy giving him the single
drives a full delivery straight to mid-off
makes a bit of room and pulls a short one but straight to midwicket
that's a low full toss and he makes room and pulls to long-on
that was close to the yorker and he makes room and ends up hitting it onto his pads
he hammers it short down the leg side, the batsman ducks quickly under that bouncer
keeps it short and tucks him up for room, he stays back and defends, good stuff from Tsotsobe
he fires that full and he hammers it down to mid-off for a single
brings up his maiden ODI fifty! Digs out a yorker to mid-on and takes a single, Parnell has done a fine job after the top order collapsed
fires that full outside off and he digs it out to the off side
hammers a low full toss down to mid-off and Ajmal has a shy at the stumps at the bowler's end and he was wide
this was short and Parnell swiveled and pulled that away with force wide of deep midwicket, finds the gap
that was a yorker and Parnell smashed that down the track and Tanvir managed to boot it away
digs out a yorker towards mid-off for a single
comes round the wicket and he gets forward and solidly defends, Pakistan just can't break through
fires a quicker one, looks to work it to the on side and he mistimes it back to the bowler
this was fuller and driven down to long-off
gives him width outside off and he looks to cut but misses
another one on the shorter side and he cuts to the off side
Ajmal takes his 150th ODI wicket! Parnell hitting out here, he stayed at the crease and looked to clear the sightscreen, skied it towards long-on and Shehzad took the catch
outside off and he's beaten
pushes a full delivery towards cover and he sets off quickly throw was wide
jams out a yorker towards cover and takes a quick single
another slower ball and wide outside off and he fails to make contact
a slower one from Tanvir, Tahir makes room and looks to slog him over deep midwicket, high in the air but doesn't get the distance, Riaz takes the skier at deep square leg

inn2.comm: drifts on the pads and he works it to the leg side
lands it a touch wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
he drifts on the pads and he works it straight to square leg
hits a good length on the stumps and he stays back and defends
edged and short of first slip! Pitched it up outside off and he pushed forward and the edge dropped short of the fielder
lands it on a good length outside off and he stays back and defends
good length on the stumps and he gets forward and defends
good length just outside off and Jamshed comes across and defends
this was a touch fuller and coming back in a little and he doesn't offer a shot
comes across the stumps and gets some solid wood on that, hit the middle of the bat
reached out and got an inside edge behind the wicket, didn't move his feet much
ends a quiet over, he comes across and pushes a length delivery to the off side
Morkel keeps it short outside off and Shahzad is careful not to poke at it
short of a length and Shahzad gets right behind the line and defends, tight bowling so far from SA
this was full on the pads and should have been put away, he ended up clipping it to midwicket
some aggression from Shahzad, this was short and he pulls bit doesn't control it well enough, Tahir sprints fine leg but cannot get under it in time, the ball nearly rolls to the rope
this was a half volley on the pads and he works it wide of midwicket
short of a length outside off and he punches it to the off side
lands it outside off and moves away slightly, doesn't offer a shot
similar delivery outside off, moves away and he doesn't offer a shot
he gets across and pushes this one down to short cover
moves across his stumps and punches a length ball down to mid-off
this was fuller in length and pushed straight to mid-off
ends another good over, he stays back and pushes it to the off side
short of a length outside off and he pushes it to cover
Jamshed looks to pull and it wasn't short enough, it hits the top of the pad and lobs away
short of a length and he stays back and defends
the pressure gets to Jamshed, this was short and gaining on the body, he looked to hook and got a top edge and Miller takes the skier in the region of short leg
he bangs it in short outside off, came on quickly and he did well to not offer a shot
hits a good length outside off and he punches it to the off side
good length outside off and he stays back and defends
this was short and he pulls it over square leg, fine leg is a bit square and he can cut it off, they have to hurry the second run
follows it up with a yorker outside off and he does well to dig it out
that was a neat looking cover drive but he failed to beat extra cover, timed it well
this was timed and placed superbly! He gets a bit of width outside off and he stays beside the line and slices it wide of backward point
short of a length, he gets across and punches it to the off side
Morkel's short of a length seems to be causing problems, beats the right-hander, squared him up
short of a length and he stays back and defends
this was on a good length outside the off stump and he doesn't offer a shot
strikes him on the pads and there's an appeal for an lbw but he's given not out, he tries to play across the line and Hawkeye shows the ball clipping the leg stump, a close shout nevertheless
this is a low full toss and he clips it away down to deep midwicket
angles it across the right-hander, he defends
he punches this one in front of mid-off and sets off, good calling by the two
good angle to the right-hander, cramps him up for room outside the off stump and he doesn't offer a shot
tucks it away down to fine leg for a single
this was short and Shahzad goes for another pull, not well timed and though he cleared square leg he couldn't find the boundary
keeps it short of a length outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
that was solidly punched off the back foot and was headed past the infield  but extra cover came in the way
this was fuller and coming in and he gets forward and defends
adjusts his length to a shorter one and he stands tall and defends
drifts on the pads and he works it straight to the fielder at midwicket
this was fuller outside off and he was forward to defend
fuller in length outside off and he stays back and defends
nearly edges that one! The slower ball and a touch shorter, extra bounce and Hafeez looks to cut but misses
fuller in length on the stumps and he gets beside the line and defends
angles across him and punched away firmly but the off side field is packed and waiting, can't get it past backward point
close call for Shehzad, Hafeez pushed this one just wide of mid-off and they set off, Shehzad had to hurry and the throw struck him
just strays on the pads and he knocks it just wide of mid-on
this was fuller outside off and he pushes it down to mid-off
this was a fraction short and he looked to pull and ended up forcing it to midwicket
good shot to release the pressure, this was pitched up on middle and leg and he lofted it through the line over mid-on
angles in and he chips it away wide of mid-on
this was short and Shehzad swivels and pulls and beats square leg, there's protection in the deep
comes well forward and he gets an inside edge to the on side
this one skids through and he defends
tossed up and he comes well forward and defends
Miller makes a mess of it! Tahir dropped this one short, Hafeez pulled and Miler gave chase from deep square leg towards long leg and he failed to time his dive well
tossed up outside off and he pushes this one to long-off
goes back and punches this one to sweeper cover
this one was short and wide outside the off stump and he punched it wide of cover and down to the sweeper
stands tall and punches it down to sweeper cover
this was wide outside off and he nearly offered an edge to the wicketkeeper
this was fuller in length outside the off stump and he pushes it down to cover
beats him this time, this one pitched outside off and held its line and beat the outside edge
short of a length and he leaves it alone
this was wide outside off and close to being called wide
this was a low full toss that should have been put away, pushes it off the toe end of the bat to the off side
stays back and he works it to the on side
comes down the track and pushes a low full toss to the on side
gets forward and pushes this to the off side
he stays deep in the crease and cuts him to point
good length on the off stump and he punches it to the off side
this was a touch too wide outside off and he doesn't offer a shot
a bit too straight and he clips it away down to midwicket
doesn't give him much room and he stays back and punches it to the off side
he makes a bit of room and punches a full delivery down to cover
strange shot from Hafeez, it was short and he fetched that from outside off and miscued the pull as he looked to play it in front of square, fell safe
shuffles and clips a length ball to square leg
just short of a length and angling across and he punches it to the off side
drifts on the body and he works it away to fine leg
he bowls full on the pads and it's easily worked away down to deep square leg
not very convincing, Shehzad half heartedly pushed at it and kept it down, the outside edge took it wide of first slip and down to third man
this one goes past the sea of confusion  between keeper and first slip! Poked at one that angled across and slip was very wide of the keeper, nobody moved
almost another boundary, this was down the leg side and pulled away, McLaren did well to slide at fine leg and cut it off
short of a length and he stays back and defends
this was bowled too full and wide outside the off stump and he drives him wide of cover
he bowls another half volley wide outside the off stump and he drives firmly to sweeper cover
quite stylish! Shehzad in full flow, this was pitched up on the stumps, he stays under the bounce and lofts crisply through the line and down to the straight boundary, hold the pose....
this was fired far too wide outside off
this was a good response from McLaren, short and Shehzad did well to fend it away
another short one and he pulls and keeps it down, deep square leg picks up
angles across him and he leaves it alone
good length angling across and he punches it to the off side
this was dropped short and he went back and pulled it away down to deep square leg
hits a good length on the stumps and he shuffles and works it away to deep square leg
dropped short of a length and he stays back and works it to deep square leg
confusion in the calling, Shehzad steered it towards point and Hafeez was already a few yards off the blocks, he had to scamper back and dive and a direct hit would have been trouble
defends a length ball to the off side
this was the slower ball and he gets forward and defends
good length on the stumps and he works it away to the on side
authoritative shot but not placed well enough to find the rope, short and he pulls it away in front of square, Ingram picks up at deep midwicket
fine shot! Pitched up outside off, he makes room and neatly carves it off the front foot down to deep backward point
short of a length and he punches it to the off side
short of a length and he clips it to midwicket
this was fired full and a touch wide outside the off stump and he leaves it alone

Hafeez has been consumed by the short ball! He bangs it in short on the body, Hafeez looked to fend it off but didn't really go through with the shot, miscued and it lobbed up to AB who jogged a few yards to his left
fullish in length across the right-hander and he leaves it alone
short and wider outside the off stump and he steers it to the off side
shuffles across the stumps and works a low full toss to midwicket
fullish in length outside the off stump and he defends with soft hands
comes forward to a fuller delivery and he pushes it to cover
short on the stumps and he stays back and defends
tossed up and he plonks forward and defends
tossed up and he comes well forward and defends
gives him width and he cuts hard but well stopped at point
fullish on the stumps and he clips it to the on side
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
tossed up and he pushes it back to the bowler
a bit too straight and he shuffles and tucks it to the leg side
this was pitched up outside off, Shehzad gets forward and lofts through the line over mid-off, Parnell does well to slide and cut it off
he stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
hits a good length outside off and he punches it to  cover
steers it down to point and thinks of a single but decides against it
stays right back at the crease and pushes it to the off side
tossed up and he comes well forward and defends
gives him width and he makes room and drives to the off side
he fires this one down the leg side and no shot offered
sudden rush of blood as Misbah looks to slog but misses
works it away to midwicket for a single
on the pads and he works it away to deep square leg
he gives him width outside off and Shehzad neatly slices this one wide of backward point and the third man slides and cuts it off and that's his fifty!

oh dear! Shehzad and Faf collide! Misbah steered it to the off side and they set off for a quick single, Faf ran in from point and dived towards the stumps just as Shehzad dived at the crease, Faf barged onto Shehhzad's chest and the batsman was struck on the chin too, Shehzad's mouth is bleeding, Faf is fine but Shehzad isn't. He is clutching his wrist as well and the physio and reserve players are out for assistance, Shehzad's on his feet so that's a good sign
and Shehzad responds by charging down the track, looks to pull but the ball strikes the body
he prefers to just steer this one down to third man, cuts out the aggression
this was short and Misbah looks to pull as well but miscues it over square leg
stays back and punches to the off side
tossed up outside off and he pushes it to long-off
gets forward and defends close to the pads
a matter of time before he brought out the reverse sweep, gets in position early and puts it away wide of Tsotsobe at short third man
works it to the off side
stays forward and works it to square leg
this was short down the leg side and he fends it off to fine leg
short of a length outside the off stump and its pushed to the off side
this was short and wide outside off and he looked to slash it away but missed
another one banged in short and Shehzad pulls over square leg, there's protection in the deep
he stays beside the line and punches it to the off side
he bangs it in short and Misbah pulls with more authority, fine leg is quite square so he's able to cut it off
he drifts on the body and he tucks it away wide of square leg
close call for Shehzad as the ball skidded through and nearly shaved the outside edge
he shuffles across to cover the line and defend
this was short and Shehzad swiveled and pulled this one in front of square, deep midwicket cuts it off
attempts another pull and he's caught at short midwicket! This trraveled quite quickly, this was short and he swiveled to pull flat and he couldn't get it past Smith
this was short of a length on the stumps and defended
Misbah watchfully steers it down to backward point
this was banged in short and he quickly ducks under that bouncer
he shuffles across the stumps, cuts it down to point but can't beat the fielder
shuffles across the crease and tucks it away easily down to square leg
fullish in length on the stumps and he pushes it just wide of mid-off
bangs it in short and he fends it off high on the body to the off side
tossed up and he comes forward and defends
gives it more air and he plonks forward and defends
full outside the off stump and he pushes it to point
beats him with the googly! Turn and bounce
tossed up outside off and he comes forward and defends
full outside off and worked to the off side
nips back in and he pushes it back to the bowler
dug it in short on the body and he tucks it to short fine leg
bangs it in short and he safely ducks under the bouncer
short outside off and he punches it down to cover
bangs in the bouncer and he sways out of the way
full on the pads and he works it to short midwicket
stays back and softly pushes it to the off side
stays deep at the crease and looks to work it to the on side, misses
that came out of nowhere! Tossed up and Misbah used his string bottom hand to flick that away to wide long-on
this was all force! This was dropped short and he pummeled it off the back foot down to deep midwicket
not sure what he was trying to do, wanted to scoop it and ended up getting an inside edge that went between his legs
he stays back at the crease and punches it to the off side
doesn't give him much width, he stays back and defends
bowls it short and he mistimes the pull to midwicket
short of a length and he steers it down to third man
little short and he moves across and nudges it down to square leg
he bowls this one short down the leg side and Amin ducks under that
punches a half volley back to the bowler who picks up and nearly flings it back
tossed up outside off and he safely leaves it alone
tossed up on the pads and he knocks it to the on side
tossed up on the pads and worked away down to mid-on
tossed up and he gets across and knocks it to the on side
pushes it against the turn to short cover
in the air but well placed, it was tossed up on the pads and he used his feet, got to the pitch of the ball and chipped it just over mid-on
chops it towards cover and Misbah sets off, there was a fumble and that allowed a single
punches it just wide of mid-off and they decide against the single initially, Tsotsobe fires a wide throw at the batsman's end and there are overthrows
bangs it in short and he ducks under the bouncer
lands it outside the off stump and he watchfully leaves it alone
pitched up outside the off stump and he reaches out and scoops it wide of point
on the pads and he clips it away down to midwicket
tucks him up for room and he stays back and defends
fires that one on the pads and stylishly flicked away wide of midwicket
angles it towards the stumps and he opens the face and steers it to point
gives him more width and he stays beside the line and dabs it wide of backward point
quite a soft dismissal in the end! Parnell pitched it up outside off, Misbah followed the angle that was taking it wide outside off, he scooped it down to backward point, easy catch in the end
and Umar Akmal wastes no time! Punishes a rank half volley wide outside off, reaches out and spanks it on the front foot wide of cover
this was angled outside off and steered firmly to third man
Morkel decides to bang it in short and test Akmal, he wisely opts not to play at it
some chin music from Morkel, another one banged in short and steep bounce, nothing much Akmal could do
if it's pitched up he's going for it, outside off and lofted through the line over mid-off, not enough to reach the rope
this was a jaffa! Akmal all at sea, pitched on the off stump and held it's line, just misses the off stump and the outside edge
another close call for Akmal! This was short of a length and he hopped to fend it off and got a leading edge that dropped in front of point
not the  best delivery, short and wide outside off, Amin stood tall and reached out and slashed it wide of slip
skidded through towards the stumps and he defends to the on side
bangs it in on a good length and punched down to point
he bangs it in short and Amin ducks under the bouncer down the leg side
bowls a fuller one and he pushes this one down the track
full toss down the leg side, poor ball and Amin should have put that away
holds the length back and Amin solidly punches it back to the bowler
Morkel keeps it short and doesn't give him much room, he doesn't offer a shot

has that actually gone out of the stadium or what! In fact it has, it was pitched up on middle and leg and Akmal nonchalantly scoops it through the line over long-on and it just kept going and going, he held the pose for a while
stays beside the line and steers it to the off side
drifts on the body and he nudges it away down to fine leg, it was placed fine and Tahir did well to chase, slide and pull it back
short of a length and he stays back and defneds
fullish in length on the stumps and he pushes it to the off side
bowls it short down the leg side and he pulls to square leg
stays beside the line and steers it wide of point
short one from McLaren and outside off, steep bounce and he doesn't offer a shot

nearly dragged this one onto the stumps! It was a yorker which he dug out and the ball was rolling towards the stumps and he quickly turned back to drag the ball back with his bat, could so easily have hit the stumps
goes for another pull and gets an inside edge that drops in front of the keeper
swivels and pulls and it's a single to square leg
he opens the face and dabs it down to third man
this was short outside off and he plays away from the body and misses
solidly punched off the back foot, this was dug in short and wide, he stood tall and placed it wide of extra cover, nobody in the ring
tucks it away to the off side
he bangs in the bouncer and Amin ducks under that one
that extra ball has cost them a wicket! Thin edge,  this was pitched up outside off, Amin went forward to play at it, didn't cover the line and he feathered an edge to the keeper

Akmal has been given out lbw and he has reviewed it. Pitched just outside off, didn't turn, went straight through, Akmal was forward and was half-heartedly looking to defend, his bat was nowhere near the ball, he was struck in front of the off stump, Hawkeye confirmed and Akmal has to go
skids through and he easily whips it away wide of midwicket
goes back at the crease and he works it wide of square leg
he works this one down to long-on
tossed up down the leg side and he gets on his knee and sweeps
gets the crowd going! This was dropped short, Afridi was waiting for that, went back and bashed it over midwicket, bisected two fielders
...and Pakistan still find time to lose another wicket! Soft dismissal, this was pitched up outside off, Tanvir was looking it run it down to third man and he gave catching practice to AB
he stays back and punches it to the off side, did AB forget that his bowler was on a hat-trick? No close fielders
he bangs this one in short and Wahab ducks under that
slower ball on the stumps and he quietly defends that
stays right behind the line and defends that one
it's a wicket maiden! Wahab stays behind the line and defend, no need to take needless risks
tossed up down the leg side and Afridi plays a premeditated sweep, it's fine and they pick up two

Afridi what have you done? To be fair it was a short ball that deserved to be hit, he rocked back and was in a hurry to pout that away over deep midwicket, he gave it a lot of power but toe-ended it, the skier was picked up by Miller who jogged back and took it in front of the rope
tossed up and he defends this one to square leg
nervy moment as he gets an inside edge that trickles to the on side
he drifts wide down the leg side and that's a bonus for Pakistan
he's trapped plumb in front! What's happening here?? On the off stump, this one shot through, he was trapped on the back foot, as plumb as it could get
optimistic shout for an lbw but that was missing the leg stump! Tahir believes he can get a wicket off every ball!
so that's two! Down the leg side and Ajmal trickles this off his pads and it just beats AB, they hurry two runs so Ajmal can get back on strike
slices him in half! Ajmal was trapped at the crease, not sure what he was trying, the ball held its line and just sailed over the stumps
and Ajmal nearly gives it away! This was angling across and he had some width, played away from the body
Ajmal's intent on chasing the one's that are wide outside off, no foot movement, nearly an edge
and now he tries to pull the short ball! It was quick and he swished at thin air, close to the glove there
I don't know how many flies Ajmal's swatted the last few minutes, this too was angling across him and he looked to slog, swing and a miss, he has all but connected with the ball in this over
nearly dragged it on! Irfan pulls a flatter delivery and gets an inside edge that just misses the stumps and that goes to fine leg

appeal for an lbw and he's been given not out and Tahir wants it reviewed, landed outside off,it was the wrong un, Irfan went forward to defend and it was quite a big stride, it struck the pad first and then the bat, Hawkeye shows that just clipping the leg stump! Not good enough to overturn the umpire's call so Irfan's safe!
loud cheers as Irfan solidly pushes this back to the bowler
a swing and a miss and there's an appeal for a stumping! Irfan looked to fetch this from wide outside off and slog over the on side, his backfoot was always back, he's safe

another googly and Irfan slogs and misses and the ball hits his back leg quite adjacent to the stumps! Well, well Tahir didn't actually appeal! Did he think there was an inside edge? That looked rather close! Why didn't he appeal?
this time Irfan plays it safe and doesn't offer a shot, it was outside off and spinning back in
drifts on the body and he hops and tucks it towards square leg, one run, precious! Irfan back on strike
this one lands outside the off stump and Irfan watchfully leaves it alone, no harm done

Morkel's hit the timber and South Africa have snatched victory from the jaws of defeat! All Morkel had to do was aim at the stumps and that's precisely what he did, Irfan was nailed to the crease, the ball landed on the off stump and held its line and shaved the stump, Morkel charges off and the South Africans can't believe it
